Class OfficerDisplay

java.lang.Object
OfficerDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDisplay
public class OfficerDisplay extends Object implements UserDisplay
Boundary.

This OfficerDisplay class handles the display and menu interactions for an Officer user. It acts as the user interface for officers to perform actions such as registering as Officer-in-Charge (OIC), viewing project assignments, replying to enquiries, booking flats, and generating receipts.

It also allows officers to continue as an Applicant if applicable. Implements the UserDisplay interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerDisplay

      public OfficerDisplay(Officer officer)
      Constructs an OfficerDisplay with a specific Officer. Initializes the corresponding OfficerController for handling logic.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer using this display interface

  • Method Details

    • showDisplay

      public void showDisplay()
      Shows the display and handles user input for officer functionalities. Offers the user a menu to either continue as an Applicant or Officer. Officer functions include project registration, viewing assigned projects, replying to enquiries, booking flats, generating receipts, and changing passwords.
      Specified by:
      showDisplay in interface UserDisplay
